animals.name: Fennec Fox (Vulpes zerda)
animals.significance: Foxes have been incorporated into various cultural beliefs as symbols of wisdom, trickery and fertility.

animals.name: Snowy Owl (Bubo scandiacus)
animals.origin: Artic North America and Paleartic, mostly in tundra
animals.significance: Often included in beliefs as symbols of wisdom, patience, solitude and death

animals.name: Unicorn
animals.origin: National Animal of Scotland, Indus Valley civilization, Greek natural history
animals.significance: A world-wide creature widely accepted into cultures with particular significance for Scotland where it was believed that the unicorn was the natural predator of the lion

animals.name: Brown Bear (Ursus arctos)
animals.origin: Found throughout Eurasia and North America
